title.rendered: Intellectsoft Named a Global Development Leader by Clutch

content.rendered:
Intellectsoft was awarded a spot as a Clutch Global Leader, a list of the 475+ most highly reviewed companies around the world.

This week, Clutch recognized us a Global Mobile, Web, and Software Development Leader in their first annual Global Leaders List 2017. The annual report includes 477 companies across six industries, and each company is evaluated based on client reviews, market presence, and ability to deliver high-quality services.

Clutch is a B2B research, ratings, and reviews firm based in Washington, DC, covering top development companies around the world. Clutch’s methodology compares business service providers and software in a specific market based on verified client reviews, services offered, work quality, and market presence.

In Clutch’s Global Leaders List, because of our wide range of services, impressive solutions, and talented team members, we were highlighted as industry leaders in several segments. We were highlighted as a Top Android App Developer, a Top iPhone App Developer, a Top Mobile App Development Company, a Top Web Development Company, and a Top Custom Software Development Company.

As an award-winning development company, our experienced team is dedicated to providing high-quality and innovative mobile and web solutions to our impressive client list. Our team caters our wide range of services to each client’s unique business needs and goals, leading to successful partnerships and growing businesses.

Our clients continue to sing our praises on Clutch, and we are proud to feature all positive reviews on our Clutch profile.

Our latest five-star reviewer praised our talent and experience:

“They struck an excellent balance in their work. Their team is talented, responsive, and produced a high-quality product. We appreciate the skill with which they tackled objective we lacked the resources to execute in-house.”

Another five-star reviewer complimented our project management and communication style:

“I’m impressed with the good communication and the willingness to go the extra mile and understand what the customer wants … This is something we’ve been impressed with, compared to some of our other technology providers, which became exacerbated at times.”

A third five-star reviewer was impressed by our expertise in the field:

“Intellectsoft was able to find experts who could build the right infrastructure for us and answer all our questions. They explained the upside and downside of every idea and every potential structure we wanted to build. They’re experts in their field.”

We are proud that our hard work is paying off, and that we have been featured as Global Leaders on Clutch. We look forward to continuing our success and to being included in their Global list again next year!

excerpt.rendered: Intellectsoft earns high spots in several key Clutch.co ratings.
